alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 3:10AM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING TO NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a trace to three hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...From 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ Saturday to noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
